http.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<request API_version="1.0" client="integrator.iop" client_ver="1.1" namespace="{{{connection.http.unencrypted.namespace}}}" key="{{{connection.http.unencrypted.apiKey}}}">
    <Auth>
        <Login>
            <company>
                {{{connection.http.unencrypted.companyId}}}
            </company>
            <user>
                {{{connection.http.unencrypted.userId}}}
            </user>
            <password>
                {{{connection.http.encrypted.password}}}
            </password>
        </Login>
    </Auth>
    <Read type="Contact" method="all" limit="{{{export.http.paging.skip}}},10"/>
</request>
